data.name: Ash & Rust Demo
data.detailed_description: Ash & Rust is a unique take on the top-down ARPG genre, with complex combat and progression systems may not be to everyone's liking. Please use this Demo to see if you enjoy the game's mechanics and to ensure that it runs well on your PC. If you like the experience and wish to continue on, I'd be honored if you supported the development by purchasing the full game. Thank you!
data.about_the_game: Ash & Rust is a unique take on the top-down ARPG genre, with complex combat and progression systems may not be to everyone's liking. pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5+ or AMD Ryzen 5+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1060 GTX or AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
